nodes.name: registerOwnership
setRecordCreatorBeneficiary
setCounterpartyBeneficiary
setBeneficiaryForCashflowId
getOwnership
getCashflowBeneficiary
registerOwnership
setRecordCreatorBeneficiary
setCounterpartyBeneficiary
setBeneficiaryForCashflowId
getOwnership
getCashflowBeneficiary

params.cashflowId: the identifier of the specific claims owned by the registerd address

getCashflowBeneficiary(bytes32,int8).return: address of the beneficiary corresponding to the given cashflowId

getOwnership(bytes32).return: addresses of all owners of the asset

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.counterpartyBeneficiary: the address of the owner of counterparty-side payment claims
params.counterpartyObligor: the address of the owner of counterparty-side payment obligations
params.recordCreatorBeneficiary: the address of the owner of creator-side payment claims
params.recordCreatorObligor: the address of the owner of creator-side payment obligations

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.cashflowId: id of the specific claims for which to register the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

getCashflowBeneficiary(bytes32,int8).notice: retrieve the registered address of the owner of specific future claims from an asset

getOwnership(bytes32).notice: retrieve the registered addresses of owners (Creator, Counterparty) of an asset

registerOwnership(bytes32,address,addres.notice: registers the addresses of the owners of an asset

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBeneficiaryForCashflowId(bytes32,int8.notice: register the address of the owner of specific claims of the asset

setCounterpartyBeneficiary(bytes32,addre.notice: update the address of the default beneficiary of cashflows going to the counter party

setRecordCreatorBeneficiary(bytes32,addr.notice: update the address of the default beneficiary of cashflows going to the record creator
